edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.Application

  • public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of this class is to update the game's logic and change the UI state based on what is occurring in the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Game game
      The Game who's logic will will be updated based on the user's interaction with the UI
      private UserInterface ui
      The UserInterface who's display will be altered by this Application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Application(UserInterface ui, Game game)
      Instantiates a new application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attemptFlee()
      This method decides what state to put the UI into and what message the UI will display based on the outcome of the game's probability based flee function.
      void chooseWeapon(int wepChoice)
      Sets the game's player object to use a weapon type chosen by the user.
      void close()
      Closes the program.
      void handleEnemyCombat()
      This method decides what state to put the UI into and what message the UI will display based on the outcome of the game's probability based combat functions relating to it's enemy object.
      void handlePlayerCombat()
      This method decides what state to put the UI into and what message the UI will display based on the outcome of the game's probability based combat functions relating to it's player object.
      void startNewGame()
      This method initializes the UI class and the game class and sets the UI to display messages relating to the beginning of the game.
      void walkForward()
      This method decides what state to put the UI into and what message the UI will display based on whether or not the game is over and if not, then on the outcome of the game's probability based spawning function.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • ui

        private UserInterface ui
        The UserInterface who's display will be altered by this Application.

        private Game game
        The Game who's logic will will be updated based on the user's interaction with the UI

                   Game game)

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • handlePlayerCombat

        public void handlePlayerCombat()
        This method decides what state to put the UI into and what message the UI will display based on the outcome of the game's probability based combat functions relating to it's player object.

      • handleEnemyCombat

        public void handleEnemyCombat()
        This method decides what state to put the UI into and what message the UI will display based on the outcome of the game's probability based combat functions relating to it's enemy object.

      • startNewGame

        public void startNewGame()
        This method initializes the UI class and the game class and sets the UI to display messages relating to the beginning of the game.

      • attemptFlee

        public void attemptFlee()
        This method decides what state to put the UI into and what message the UI will display based on the outcome of the game's probability based flee function.

      • walkForward

        public void walkForward()
        This method decides what state to put the UI into and what message the UI will display based on whether or not the game is over and if not, then on the outcome of the game's probability based spawning function.

      • chooseWeapon

        public void chooseWeapon(int wepChoice)
        Sets the game's player object to use a weapon type chosen by the user.
        Parameters:
        wepChoice - the weapon choice

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the program.
